dialogue.name: AUGEBERT
dialogue.text: Well, if it isn't Forename! Take a look around and feast your eyes on Featherfall, the latest district of the Firmament, now open for business! And needless to say, we couldn't have done it without you.

dialogue.name: AUGEBERT
dialogue.text: As you doubtless already know, Featherfall's to serve as the Firmament's commercial district. Here you'll find a branch office of the Skysteel Manufactory, an impressive residence we call Hoarfrost Hall, and a lively marketplace where you'll find traders and merchants peddlin' goods from the realm over.

dialogue.name: AUGEBERT
dialogue.text: Aye, no end of merchants, craftsmen, and laborers have been beatin' down our doors hopin' to make a new home here. Not that I can blame themâ”€why, I've half a mind to relocate here myself!

dialogue.name: AUGEBERT
dialogue.text: Lord Francel believes it's only a matter of time before Featherfall becomes the livin', beatin' heart of the Firmament, and from the look of things, I reckon it's half there already.

dialogue.name: AUGEBERT
dialogue.text: 'Course, it's still a work in progress, and there's plenty of construction and restoration work yet to be done. If you'd be so kind as to help us keep a steady stream of supplies flowin' in, we'd be grateful as ever.
